pddl4j.exp.cond
Class CondExp

java.lang.Object
  pddl4j.exp.AbstractExp
      pddl4j.exp.cond.CondExp
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, Exp
Direct Known Subclasses:
BinaryCondExp, UnaryCondExp
public abstract class CondExp
extends AbstractExp

This abstract class defines a conditional expression of the pddl language.

See Also:

getCondition

public final Condition getCondition()
Returns the condition of this conditional expression.

Returns:

equals

public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
Returns true if this conditional expression is equal to an other object. This method returns true if the object is a not null instance of the class CondExp and both conditional expression have the same condition.

Specified by:
equals in interface Exp
Overrides:
equals in class AbstractExp
Parameters:
obj - the object to be compared.
Returns:
true if this conditional expression is equal to an other object; false otherwise.

hashCode

public int hashCode()
Returns a hash code value for the conditional expression. This method is supported for the benefit of hash tables such as those provided by java.util.Hashtable.

Specified by:

Overrides:
